TopicTitle: Survey scanner won't preform orbital survey

Articles.Content: I attached a survey scanner on a vessel, put it in a stable orbit between 60 and 150 km, and it didn't allow me to preform the orbital survey. It still said "You must be in a stable orbit between 60- 150 km". Please help and thanks. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Hi Two of Three, you need to be in a polar orbit ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
